name: RUST MONSTER

traits.name: Iron Scent
traits.text: The rust monster can pinpoint the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of itself.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The rust monster makes one Bite attack and uses Antennae twice.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Antennae
actions.text: The rust monster targets one nonmagical metal object-armor or a weapon-worn or carried by a creature within 5 feet of itself. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 11, the creature with the object. Failure: The object takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers (armor) or to its attack rolls (weapon). Armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, and a weapon is destroyed if its penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the Mending spell on the armor or weapon.

actions.name: Destroy Metal
actions.text: The rust monster touches a nonmagical metal object within 5 feet of itself that isn't being worn or carried. The touch destroys a 1-foot Cube of the object.

reactions.name: Reflexive Antennae
reactions.text: Trigger: An attack roll hits the rust monster. Response: The rust monster uses Antennae.

raw_text:
AC 14 	Initiative +1 (11)
HP 33 (6d8 + 6)
Speed 40 ft.
Medium Monstrosity, Unaligned
